health_changerate.description: How the health changes when not wounded, units per second

health_changerate_cooldown.description: How long after taking any damage to wait until we start regenerating.

regeneration_segments.description: The number of segments for regeneration.

regeneration_changerate.description: How health changes in regeneration, units per seconds

constitution.description: Negative health (after health is depleted the constitution ticks down until entity is dead)

constitution_changerate.description: The rate at which health is changed in constitution, units per second

constitution_disables_interactions.description: [bool]Should interactions be disabled when this goes into constitution

zone_bleedout_changerate.description: The rate at which health is changed in constitution for zones, units per second

unit_size.description: The size category of the unit, this is used for systems such as the gib system. Small = Humansized, Medium = Bug Warrior sized, Large = Tunneler, Massive = Even larger

unit_mass.description: The mass of the unit, this is used for systems such as vehicle collision damage calculations, when the unit is relying on a static or keyframed body.

kill_score.description: The score to accumulate when killing this.

wounded_state.description: The effect wounds has on this character

default_damageable_zone_info.description: Contains information about default damage zone, which is used if no specific damage zone was hit

damageable_zones.description: Contains all damage zones for the entity.

decay.description: At least mode is required, for regular, more info may be needed

death_sound_ids.description: [wwise]Sounds to trigger when the entity experiences real death.

trigger_death_sounds_on_remove.description: [bool]Should this entity trigger death sounds if it gets removed?

on_hit_effect.description: Particle effect to play when the entity gets hit by damage that is not dps.

while_living_effect.description: Particle effects to play while the entity lives and is destroyed on death.

on_death_effect.description: Particle effect to play when the entity dies.

bled_to_death_effect.description: Particle effect to play when the entity dies from bleeding out(cancels out the on_death_effect in that case).

require_demolition.description: [bool]Does this entity require demolition damage to be damaged?

downed_anim.description: [string]Animation event that gets called when entering constitution.

dead_anim.description: [string]Animation event that gets called when entering death.

on_downed_hide_visibility_group.description: [string]Visibility group to hide when this unit gets downed.

on_downed_show_visibility_group.description: [string]Visibility group to show when this unit gets downed.

on_dead_hide_visibility_group.description: [string]Visibility group to hide when this unit dies.

on_dead_show_visibility_group.description: [string]Visibility group to show when this unit dies.

on_death_destruction_level.description: If this unit dies from the health component, then apply this level of destrction to itself from the destruction system

can_die_naturally.description: [bool]Normally if a unit takes enough damage, they'll die. If this is disabled, it will only go down to constitution and needs to be killed via outside forces, such as behavior.

death_propagation.description: If this unit dies, It'll propagate the death to the selected inheritance direction selected in this field.
